helpDescription: Tips and tricks to get the most out of {{applicationName}}.
incompleteLanguages: The following languages are incomplete and may have missing translations.
title: Dashboard
userSettingsApiKeyDescription1: API keys are used to authenticate API requests without using your username and password. If you have set up your calendar application to automatically refresh milestone updates, you are using your API key.
userSettingsApiKeyDescription2: If you believe your API key has been compromised, you can reset it here. This will invalidate your current API key and generate a new one.
userSettingsConsignoCloudDescription: The {{consignoCloudLink}} integration allows you to send contracts to purchasers for electronic signatures.
userSettingsConsignoCloudPasswordHelp: This is not the same as your ConsignO Cloud password. It is a separate password that you can generate in your ConsignO Cloud preferences.
userSettingsConsignoCloudUserNameHelp: This is the email address you use to log in to ConsignO Cloud.
userSettingsNtfyDescription: The {{ntfyLink}} integration allows you to receive notifications about important events in the application.
